title: Trump says Taiwan should pay the U.S. for defense; shares of chip giant TSMC fall

title: Wealth in Turkey grew the most in the world at 157% despite soaring inflation, according to ranking

title: Money launderers are increasingly turning to crypto to conceal flow of funds, Chainalysis says
